channel.title: Help Editing Flash Template
channel.description:
I am currently at my dads house and staying there for a few days and i cant download anything on his computer. So I was hoping someone here would edit a flash template for me. All they really have to do is edit some text and a couple of pictures.
If you can do it for me or will give it a try, please post here. I will send you the flash template in a pm and tell you what I want changed.
This would be greatly appreciated :)

item.title: Help Editing Flash Template

kloplop321 did it for me already… thanks again kloplop321!!!

item.title: Help Editing Flash Template
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:4, topic:142711”][quote author=kloplop321 link=topic=195243.msg1753254#msg1753254 date=1189668962]
I could do it as well. I use Flash 8, I don’t like the new CS3 version…
[/quote]Most of the CS3 software is shit. GG to Adobe.[/quote]
I agree there,

yah, they chucked out a lot of user interface and Action-script 3.0 just doesn’t cut it, it is not compatible with 2.0 which is RETARDED!

Read full topic
